content:
Great job on completing The Last of Us Part II on both normal and hard difficulties! Your playtime is quite impressive, especially considering the emotional intensity of the game.

25 hours on normal difficulty and 30 hours on hard difficulty are both very reasonable playtimes for a game of this scope and complexity. The game's developers, Naughty Dog, are known for crafting engaging stories and characters, and it's clear that you were invested in the game's narrative.

It's also interesting that you noticed a 5-hour difference between your playtimes on normal and hard difficulties. This suggests that you might have taken a more careful and deliberate approach on hard difficulty, which is understandable given the increased challenge.

If you don't mind me asking, what did you think of the game's difficulty curve? Did you find it challenging but fair, or were there any sections that felt frustratingly difficult?

Also, are you planning on replaying the game again on an even higher difficulty, or exploring other games in the series, like The Last of Us Remastered or The Last of Us: Left Behind?
